column4: if i compile my kernel for core2duo... it will be a 64 bit kernel?
just because you compile for a processor it wont make it a 64bit kernel.. i believe there are 32bit core 2 duo procs
no i am pretty sure there are 32bit core 2 duo processors
c2d processors have a 32 and a 64 bit mode
uhm.. help me out then. c2d supports both 32 and 64 bit mode. there are processors that only support one or the other
dude, what is this with you and "mode"? A processor is either a 32bit or 64bit processor
uhm but it talks aboout "native 64 bit mode" explicitly
â€¦ you want a processor that has no 32bit support?
but you cant run 64 bit OS on a 32 bit only processor
so how can it be OS only?
uhm yea... processors without 32 bit support. i thought they were out already
I have never heard of a 64bit processor that has no 32bit support, imo that sounds like it would be foolish considering how widespread 32bit is still used
